pkgmetadata.longdescription: Testpath is a collection of utilities for Python code working with files and commands.It contains functions to check things on the filesystem, and tools for mockingsystem commands and recording calls to those.`Documentation on ReadTheDocs <https://testpath.readthedocs.io/en/latest/>`_e.g.:: import testpath testpath.assert_isfile(path) with testpath.assert_calls('git', ['add', path]): function_under_test()
